mapper.select: select * from tbl_order where user_id = #{user_id} order by order_date
select count(order_no) from tbl_order where user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_order (order_no, order_product_title, order_date, order_cnt, order_invoice ,order_total, user_id) values (#{order_no}, #{order_product_title}, sysdate, #{order_cnt}, ' ' ,#{order_total}, #{user_id})

insert into tbl_order_detail ( order_detail_no, order_no, order_detail_mid, order_detail_fno, order_detail_cnt) values (order_detail_no_seq.nextval, #{order_no}, #{order_detail_mid}, #{order_detail_fno}, #{order_detail_cnt})
mapper.select: SELECT l.like_no, p.product_no, p.product_title, p.product_date, p.product_price, p.product_cont1 FROM tbl_like l JOIN tbl_product p ON l.like_pro_no = p.product_no where like_mem_id = #{like_mem_id}

SELECT c.cart_no, c.cart_mem_id, c.cart_pro_no, c.cart_cnt, p.product_cont1, p.product_title, p.product_price FROM tbl_cart c JOIN tbl_product p ON c.cart_pro_no = p.product_no where c.cart_mem_id= #{cart_mem_id}

SELECT c.cart_no, c.cart_mem_id, c.cart_pro_no, c.cart_cnt, p.product_cont1, p.product_title, p.product_price FROM tbl_cart c JOIN tbl_product p ON c.cart_pro_no = p.product_no where c.cart_no= #{cart_no}
mapper.update: update tbl_cart set cart_cnt=cart_cnt+1 where cart_no=#{cart_no} and cart_mem_id=#{cart_mem_id}
mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_no, c.cart_mem_id, c.cart_pro_no, c.cart_cnt, p.product_cont1, p.product_title, p.product_price FROM tbl_cart c JOIN tbl_product p ON c.cart_pro_no = p.product_no where c.cart_no= (select max(cart_no) from tbl_cart) and cart_mem_id=#{c.cart_mem_id}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_addr (addr_no,user_id,postCode, roadAddr, detailAddr,addr_name) values (addr_no_seq.nextval, #{user_id}, #{postCode}, #{roadAddr},#{detailAddr}, #{addr_name})
mapper.update: update tbl_addr set addr_name=#{addr_name}, postCode=#{postCode}, roadAddr=#{roadAddr}, detailAddr=#{detailAddr} where addr_no=#{addr_no}
mapper.select: SELECT p.product_title, p.product_cont1, p.product_no, o.order_date, o.order_product_title, r.re_mem_id, r.re_title, r.re_content, r.re_image1, r.re_image2, r.re_image3, r.re_date FROM tbl_product p LEFT JOIN tbl_order o ON o.order_product_title = p.product_title LEFT JOIN tbl_reviews r ON r.re_pro_no = p.product_no WHERE r.re_mem_id=#{re_mem_id}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reviews (re_no, re_pro_no, re_mem_id, re_title, re_content, re_image1, re_image2, re_image3, re_score, re_date) values (re_no_seq.nextval, #{re_pro_no}, #{re_mem_id}, #{re_title}, #{re_content}, #{re_image1}, #{re_image2}, #{re_image3}, #{re_score}, sysdate)
